name: Laser Pointer (bapbop)
description:
you play as two playable character that a laser is connecting each other much like a rope and must use this laser to kill the blobs that comes in waves that's after one of your player.

wsad and arrow key to control both player

use the laser between the player to kill the blobs

(I forgot to add the main menu scene in the build setting and after fixing that i cant build at all so here is the one without the main menu)
